text: == Events == * September 21 – Peace of Arras between Charles VII of France and Philip III of Burgundy, ending the English-Burgundian alliance. * Francis of Paola founds the Order of the Minims in Italy. == Births == * June 17 – King Edward I of England (died 1307) * December 17 – Kujo Yoritsugu, Japanese shogun (died 1256) * Peter III of Aragon (died 1285) * John II, Duke of Brittany (died 1305) * Ippen, Japanese monk (died 1289) == Deaths == *
